channel.title: 15m Fanmade Portal 2 Movie
channel.description: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=539oNONcCrI[/url] [quote] Aperture: Lab Ratt is a live action interpretation of VALVe's web comic 'Portal 2: Lab Rat' and follows the story of the schizophrenic hero behind the walls; Doug Rattmann. [/quote] I enjoyed it.

item.title: 15m Fanmade Portal 2 Movie

item.description:
Pretty good. Pretty damn good.

item.title: 15m Fanmade Portal 2 Movie
item.dc:creator: higgsboson
item.description:
Amazing! Love it! Good lighting, good acting, good actors, cuts, angles, cinematography, great music and voices… These things are still the most important when making a film, and they tend to get left behind nowadays.

Read full topic

item.title: 15m Fanmade Portal 2 Movie
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Wasn’t bad.
Way better than the FX dick wagging all the other Valve related fanfilms are.

item.title: 15m Fanmade Portal 2 Movie
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=539oNONcCrI

Aperture: Lab Ratt is a live action interpretation of VALVe’s web comic ‘Portal 2: Lab Rat’ and follows the story of the schizophrenic hero behind the walls; Doug Rattmann.

I enjoyed it.
